messages.message:
Folks, a premerge of mine fails with an error that I don't quite understand.
https://jenkins.instabase.com/blue/organizations/jenkins/instabase/detail/PR-37046/9/pipeline
Does this indicate some network level issues on the pre-merge build machines? I have seen a few other random looking errors that point to similar network issues.
I retried a few times, but no luck. And the PR itself has nothing to do with api-server. It just introduces a new DB table and schema.
```
[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z]   ConnectionResetError

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z] 

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z]   [Errno 104] Connection reset by peer

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z] 

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z]   at /pyenv/versions/3.7.3/lib/python3.7/ssl.py:911 in read

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z]        907│         if self._sslobj is None:

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z]        908│             raise ValueError("Read on closed or unwrapped SSL socket.")

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z]        909│         try:

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z]        910│             if buffer is not None:

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z]     →  911│                 return self._sslobj.read(len, buffer)

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z]        912│             else:

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z]        913│                 return self._sslobj.read(len)

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z]        914│         except SSLError as x:

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z]        915│             if x.args[0] == SSL_ERROR_EOF and self.suppress_ragged_eofs:

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z] 

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z] The following error occurred when trying to handle this error:

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z] 

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z] 

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z]   ProtocolError

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z] 

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z]   ("Connection broken: ConnectionResetError(104, 'Connection reset by peer')", ConnectionResetError(104, 'Connection reset by peer'))

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z] 

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z]   at /var/jenkins_home/poetry/venv/lib/python3.7/site-packages/urllib3/response.py:461 in _error_catcher

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z]       457│                 raise ReadTimeoutError(self._pool, None, "Read timed out.")

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z]       458│ 

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z]       459│             except (HTTPException, SocketError) as e:

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z]       460│                 # This includes IncompleteRead.

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z]     → 461│                 raise ProtocolError("Connection broken: %r" % e, e)

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z]       462│ 

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z]       463│             # If no exception is thrown, we should avoid cleaning up

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z]       464│             # unnecessarily.

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z]       465│             clean_exit = True

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z] 

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z] The following error occurred when trying to handle this error:

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z] 

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z] 

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z]   ChunkedEncodingError

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z] 

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z]   ("Connection broken: ConnectionResetError(104, 'Connection reset by peer')", ConnectionResetError(104, 'Connection reset by peer'))

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z] 

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z]   at /var/jenkins_home/poetry/venv/lib/python3.7/site-packages/requests/models.py:818 in generate

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z]        814│             if hasattr(self.raw, "stream"):

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z]        815│                 try:

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z]        816│                     yield from self.raw.stream(chunk_size, decode_content=True)

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z]        817│                 except ProtocolError as e:

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z]     →  818│                     raise ChunkedEncodingError(e)

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z]        819│                 except DecodeError as e:

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z]        820│                     raise ContentDecodingError(e)

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z]        821│                 except ReadTimeoutError as e:

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z]        822│                     raise ConnectionError(e)

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z] 

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z]   • Installing testing-redis (1.1.1)

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z]   • Installing typeguard (2.7.1)

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z]   • Installing usaddress (0.5.10)

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z]   • Installing xlsxwriter (1.0.2)

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z]   • Installing zipcodes (1.2.0)

[2023-03-04T00:18:24.058Z] make[2]: Leaving directory '/instabase_dir/webserver/api-server'```
@lenny @Cheryl Zhou Another thing that looks curious is why api-server is running something on python 3.7 instead of python 3.9.
